name: openrecall (openrecall)
description: [项目级] OpenRecall is a fully open-source, privacy-first alternative to proprietary solutions like Microsoft's Windows Recall. With OpenRecall, you can easily access your digital history, enhancing your memory and productivity without compromising your privacy.。来源: https://github.com/openrecall/openrecall

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
OpenRecall is a fully open-source, privacy-first alternative to proprietary solutions like Microsoft's Windows Recall. With OpenRecall, you can easily access your digital history, enhancing your memory and productivity without compromising your privacy.

来源: https://github.com/openrecall/openrecall
语言: Python
Stars: 2749

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content: - **Time Travel**: Revisit and explore your past digital activities seamlessly across Windows, macOS, or Linux. - **Local-First AI**: OpenRecall harnesses the power of local AI processing to keep your data private and secure. - **Semantic Search**: Advanced local OCR interprets your history, providing robust semantic search capabilities. - **Full Control Over Storage**: Your data is stored locally, giving you complete control over its management and security.

genes.title: openrecall 模块说明
genes.content:
OpenRecall offers several key advantages over closed-source alternatives:

- **Transparency**: OpenRecall is 100% open-source, allowing you to audit the source code for potential backdoors or privacy-invading features.
- **Cross-platform Support**: OpenRecall works on Windows, macOS, and Linux, giving you the freedom to use it on your preferred operating system.
- **Privacy-focused**: Your data is stored locally on your device, no internet connection or cloud is required. In addition, you have t
